ftbquests.chapter.base_expansion.title: Base Expansion[--基础扩展--]
ftbquests.chapter.base_expansion.quests0: Smaller on the outside![--外部更小!--]
&bCompact Machines&r contain within them a &6small pocket dimension&r, which can be accessed through a &bPersonal Shrinking Device&r![--&b合成机器&r内含&6小型口袋维度&r,可以通过&b个人收缩设备&r访问!--]
If the chunk the Compact Machine is in is loaded, the chunks inside the machine are loaded.[--如果压缩机器所在的区块被加载,则机器内部的区块会被加载.--]
Higher tiers have more space inside. See each block's tooltip for exact sizes.[--更高的等级具有更多的内部空间。查看每个方块的提示文本以查看其精确大小.--]
ftbquests.chapter.base_expansion.quests1: Make something from Building Gadgets[--用建筑小帮手制作一些东西--]
&eBuilding Gadgets&r offers many tools for helping to build.[--&e建筑小帮手&r提供了许多帮助建造的工具.--]
The basic &bBuilding Gadget&r is great for &6quickly building out structures&r.[--基础&b建筑小帮手&r对&6快速建造结构&r很有用.--]
The &bCopy-Paste Gadget&r can &6recreate structures&r, including ones from the internet![--&bCopy-Paste小帮手&r可以&6重铸结构&r,包括来自网络的结构!--]
The &bExchanging Gadget&r can quickly &6swap blocks&r.[--&b改变小帮手&r可以快速&6Swap块&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.base_expansion.quests2: &bConstruction Wands&r are used to &6place multible blocks at once&r.[--&b建造法杖&r用于同时&6放置多方块&r.--]
Use them on the side of a line of blocks, and it will place on all blocks on the line.[--在方块线的侧面使用它们,它会放置在线上的所有方块上。--]
ftbquests.chapter.base_expansion.quests3: Design Tips Whittle By Whittle[--设计提示:Whittlebywhittle--]
We're going to look at different ways to customize the look of any base. First up, the &bChisel&r from &eRechiseled&r.[--我们将研究不同方式自定义任何基座的外观。首先,&e回收&r的&b凿子&r.--]
This is the first item that can expand your texture palette. Some choices have &6connected textures&r![--这是第一个可以扩展材质图腾的物品。一些选择有&6连接的材质&r!--]
The &eChipped&r is a series of crafting tables that change the textures of several blocks and items. [--&e切换&r是系列改变多个方块和物品的材质的合成表.--]

The easiest to craft is the &bCarpenter's Table&r which, you guessed it, alters wood built items such as planks, logs, trap doors, torches, bookshelves, doors, etc.[--最易制作的就是&b木匠工作台&r,你猜到它会改变木制成的物品,例如木板、原木、活板门、火把、书架、门等等.--]
ftbquests.chapter.base_expansion.quests4: Don't Take This Quest Line For Granite[--不要为花岗岩选择这个任务线--]
The &bMason Table&r will help you customize stone, clay, bricks, and netherack based items.[--&b岩浆桌&r会帮助您自定义基于石头、粘土、砖块和下界ack的物品.--]
ftbquests.chapter.base_expansion.quests5: Thistle While You Work[--当你工作的时候,--]
The &bBotanist Table&r will customize a variety of plants as well as the dirt, sand and gravel.[--&b植物学家工作台&r将自定义各种植物以及泥土、沙子和砂砾.--]
ftbquests.chapter.base_expansion.quests6: Make a Glassblower[--做个吹玻璃机--]
The &bGlass Blower&r allows you to customize all kinds of glass blocks. Very &ca&6e&es&at&3h&9e&5t&ci&6c&r.[--&b玻璃吹风器&r允许你自定义所有类型的玻璃方块.非常&c&6e&es&at&3h&9e&5t&ci&6c&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.base_expansion.quests7: Make a Tinkering Table[--做个工匠桌--]
The &bTinkering Table&r and &bAlchemy Table&r will cover a variety of other blocks, such as Redstone, Amethyst, and the like.[--&b洗矿台&r和&b炼金台&r将覆盖各种其他方块,例如红石、紫水晶等.--]
ftbquests.chapter.base_expansion.quests8: I'm stuck on you[--我被你卡住了--]
This simple &bMagnet&r &6pulls in nearby items&r.[--这个简单的&b磁铁&r&6在附近的物品中拉线&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.base_expansion.quests9: &bCharms&r from &eApotheosis&r, when activated, &6provide a long-lasting potion effect&r.[--&bCarms&r来自&eApothesisis&r,当激活时,&6提供长效药水效果&r.--]
They can even be &6enchanted&r to last longer![--它们甚至可以&6附魔&r持续更久!--]
